Text: Great quality but there is no 5.1 channel audio track like it says... which is why i downloaded it :(
looks like a pretty cool movie. thanks for the rip and upload :)

@spurs4ever
RC BDRip means the video is of Blu Ray quality but the audio is LiNE audio

@deaddude2
RC means Russian Copy.They are real blurays but meant for Russian region with Russian real DTS audio.So RC BDrip means the Video of real blu ray but audio is changed to English LiNE audio

yep! be aware guys the Audio is NOT 6 channels!!

i stoped downloading,i just wasted 260mb! Damn

So it is up 2 U if U wanna wait for proper one or just grab it ;)

PS. Video is OK ;)

PS2. BTW, RC means Russian Copy or Region Code ( which refers to releases usually from Russia/Asia region ), like R5 or R6 for DivX/XviD movies. Quality can vary, from Very Good ( a/v ) to Very Bad ( a/v, as far usually video is OK, but audio can be crap as it comes NOT from BluRay source, but from LINE source ). Always, if possible OC, check sample before download such copy
Greetz
